tool_description: Detailed technical specs on over 1000 airplane models. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/aircraft
name: Aircraft by API-Ninjas
title: Aircraft by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/aircraft
api_list.description:
API Ninjas Aircraft API endpoint. Returns a list of aircrafts that match the given parameters. This API only supports airplanes - for helicopter specs please use our Helicopter API.

At least one of the following parameters (excluding the limit parameter) must be set.

optional_parameters.name: min_height
optional_parameters.description: Minimum height of the aircraft in feet.

optional_parameters.name: min_wingspan
optional_parameters.description: Minimum wingspan of the aircraft in feet.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between 1 and 30. Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: max_height
optional_parameters.description: Maximum height of the aircraft in feet.

optional_parameters.name: max_length
optional_parameters.description: Maximum length of the aircraft in feet.

optional_parameters.name: min_length
optional_parameters.description: Minimum length of the aircraft in feet.

optional_parameters.name: max_range
optional_parameters.description: Maximum range of the aircraft in nautical miles.

optional_parameters.name: min_range
optional_parameters.description: Minimum range of the aircraft in nautical miles.

optional_parameters.name: max_speed
optional_parameters.description: Maximum max. air speed in knots.

optional_parameters.name: max_wingspan
optional_parameters.description: Maximum wingspan of the aircraft in feet.

optional_parameters.name: engine_type
optional_parameters.description: Type of engine. Must be one of: piston, propjet, jet.

optional_parameters.name: min_speed
optional_parameters.description: Minimum max. air speed in knots.

optional_parameters.name: manufacturer
optional_parameters.description: Company that designed and built the aircraft.
